title: Gunmen kill 12 forest guards in Nigeria's northcentral region
description: Gunmen attacked a community in northcentral Nigeria, killing at least 12 forest guards, according to local police.
description_with_more_context: Gunmen attacked a community in northcentral Nigeria, killing at least 12 forest guards, according to local police.

title: 12 forest guards killed by gunmen in northcentral Nigeria
description: Gunmen launched an attack on a community in northcentral Nigeria, resulting in the deaths of at least 12 forest guards.
description_with_more_context: Gunmen launched an attack on a community in northcentral Nigeria, resulting in the deaths of at least 12 forest guards.
